name: Corbus Pharmaceuticals Holdings, Inc.
description: Corbus Pharmaceuticals Holdings, Inc. is a clinical-stage pharmaceutical company focused on the development and commercialization of novel therapeutics for the treatment of rare and serious diseases. Founded in 2014 and headquartered in Norwood, Massachusetts, Corbus is committed to advancing drug candidates that target the endocannabinoid system to address unmet medical needs. The company’s lead product candidate, lenabasum, is designed to treat serious autoimmune and fibrotic diseases. Lenabasum is currently being evaluated in multiple clinical trials for indications such as systemic sclerosis, dermatomyositis, and cystic fibrosis. Corbus is also exploring other therapeutic areas and drug candidates that leverage its proprietary drug delivery platform. The company emphasizes a patient-centric approach, striving to improve the quality of life for patients suffering from chronic conditions. Through its innovative research and development efforts, Corbus aims to deliver breakthrough therapies that can transform treatment paradigms in the pharmaceutical industry.

key_executives.name: David K. G. K. K. H. D. F. L. A. M. R. D. E. S. M. G.
